Note: Attributed to Jerome in the MS.
_description: A couplet translating ‘Tunc est preclara apud Deum abstinencia cum animus ieiunat a viciis’ in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
þanne is abstinence of worþinesseWan man fastet fro
                    wikednesse
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 3.
